summary: Lily, Gemma and Scarlet elven followers
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]STANDALONE MOD[/size]: no other mods are required.
This is a follower mod, the armors are not included.

UPDATE: I added their CME saves.

[size=4][color=#21cad5]I like seeing your pictures, so feel free to add them.^^[/color][/size]

[center] [img]http://www.kephost.com/images4/2014/3/23/a1_2014_3_23_tpuvvdxjr9.jpg[/img] [/center]

[color=#54beba][size=4]LILY[/size][/color]

[color=#54beba]Location:[/color] Arcaneum - College of Winterhold

[color=#54beba]CLASS:[/color] Destruction, Conjuration Mage

[color=#54beba]Flags:[/color] Essential, Marriageable

[color=#54beba]Skills[/color]

- Destruction
- Conjuration
- Sneak

[center] [img]http://www.kephost.com/images4/2014/3/23/a1_2014_3_23_80mzo8trta.jpg[/img] [/center]

[color=#2c8a30][size=4]SCARLET[/size][/color]

[color=#2c8a30]Location:[/color] Jorrvaskr - Whiterun

[color=#2c8a30]CLASS:[/color] Ranger

[color=#2c8a30]Flags:[/color] Essential, Marriageable

[color=#2c8a30]Skills[/color]

- Archery
- Light armor
- Sneak


[center] [img]http://www.kephost.com/images4/2014/3/23/a1_2014_3_23_fh7aoy2l2q.jpg[/img] [/center]

[color=#784496][size=4]GEMMA[/size][/color]

[color=#784496]Location:[/color] Jorrvaskr - Whiterun

[color=#784496]CLASS:[/color] Warrior - 2H

[color=#784496]Flags:[/color] Essential, Marriageable

[color=#784496]Skills[/color]

- Two-handed weapons
- Heavy armor
- Sneak



Thank you for this
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1937550/?]maplevolt[/url]:

Link to NewSea's homepage in ReadMe.

Thank you for your great works and permissions!


[size=4][color=#21cad5]Other:[/color][/size]

On the Screenshots they wear [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?]TERA armors[/url] by asianboy345


[size=4]How to change hair color[/size]


In Skyrim/Data/Meshes/Actors/Character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/ElvenSisters.esp/
open 00000D62 (for example, if you want change Scarlet's hair) in NifSkope

Just make sure the hairline and hair tint colors are the same:

[img]http://www.kephost.com/images4/2014/3/24/a1_2014_3_24_26thbz255m.jpg[/img]



[size=4]How to change their VOICE[/size]

Open the esp in creation kit, load it (like Skyrim.esm and Update.esm)
Single click on actor, and search for their names (that one you want to choose)
Double click the name, it will open their windows.
Under Traits tab you can select another voice type, just make sure it works fine with followers.

Voices for followers who can marry and adopt:

- Female: Commander, Sultry, YoungEager

Voices for followers who can marry:

- Female: DarkElf, EvenToned, Orc

Voices for spouses who can adopt:

- Female: Commoner, Coward, ElfHaughty, Nord

Voices for follower who can adopt:

- Female: Condescending

Voices for only spouses:

- Female: Argonian, Shrill




Video made by hodilton :

[center] [youtube]gQSTAOoZmcI[/youtube] [/center]
author: Kumiiho
